Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare.
Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare.

Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue  Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Division.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Division.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
